processInstanceId = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update processBase set reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processInstanceId = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applyDate = #{applyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT RES.PROC_INST_ID_ as processInstanceId, RES.ID_ as taskId, RES.START_TIME_ as startTime, RES.CLAIM_TIME_ as claimTime, RES.END_TIME_ as endTime, RES.DELETE_REASON_ as deleteReason, RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefId FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST RES WHERE RES.ASSIGNEE_ = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND RES.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL
AND UPPER(RES.PROC_DEF_ID_) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY RES.END_TIME_ DESC
